title: Jefferson Elementary School to host spring clothing drive
body: Clothing drive will be held at the Jefferson School in Westfield on April 22.On Thursday, April 22, Westfield’s Jefferson Elementary School will host a spring clothing drive to benefit the fifth-grade class.The event will be held from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. near the Jefferson field on Clover Street. Items collected will include clothing, toys, strollers and bikes. Those who donate are asked to keep toys, clothing and stuffed animals separate — this helps with the donation and sorting process. There will be marked areas for the various donations. Books will not be accepted. For more information, go to .Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
